name: greenpeace/planet4-content-default
description: Scripts that control the default content of the default planet4 installation

scripts.core:initial-content-4: wp menu location assign navigation-bar-menu navigation-bar-menu
scripts.core:initial-content-5: idd=$(wp post list --post_type=page --title=act --field=ID | head -1); wp menu item add-post navigation-bar-menu $idd --classes="hidden-md-down hidden-lg-down"
scripts.core:initial-content-6: idd=$(wp post list --post_type=page --title=explore --field=ID | head -1); wp menu item add-post navigation-bar-menu $idd --classes="hidden-md-down hidden-lg-down"
scripts.core:initial-content-8: wp menu item add-custom "Footer Social" Twitter http://twitter.com --position=1 --classes="fa fa-twitter"
scripts.core:initial-content-9: wp menu item add-custom "Footer Social" Facebook http://facebook.com --position=2 --classes="fa fa-facebook-official"
scripts.core:initial-content-10: wp menu item add-custom "Footer Social" Youtube http://youtube.com --position=3 --classes="fa fa-youtube-play"
scripts.core:initial-content-11: wp menu item add-custom "Footer Social" Instagram http://instagram.com --position=4 --classes="fa fa-instagram"
scripts.core:initial-content-18: idd=$(wp post list --post_type=page --title=news --field=ID | head -1);wp menu item add-post "Footer Primary" $idd --title="NEWS" --position=1
scripts.core:initial-content-19: idd=$(wp post list --post_type=page --title=about --field=ID | head -1);wp menu item add-post "Footer Primary" $idd --title="ABOUT" --position=2
scripts.core:initial-content-20: idd=$(wp post list --post_type=page --title=faq --field=ID | head -1);wp menu item add-post "Footer Primary" $idd --title="JOBS" --position=3
scripts.core:initial-content-21: idd=$(wp post list --post_type=page --title=press --field=ID | head -1);wp menu item add-post "Footer Primary" $idd --title="FAQ" --position=4
scripts.core:initial-content-22: idd=$(wp post list --post_type=page --title=terms --field=ID | head -1);wp menu item add-post "Footer Primary" $idd --title="PRESS" --position=5
scripts.core:initial-content-24: wp post create --post_type=page --post_title="CODE OF CONDUCT" --post_name=codeofconduct --post_status=publish page-code-of-conduct.html
scripts.core:initial-content-27: idd=$(wp post list --post_type=page --title=privacy --field=ID | head -1);wp menu item add-post "Footer Secondary" $idd --title="PRIVACY" --position=1
scripts.core:initial-content-28: idd=$(wp post list --post_type=page --name=codeofconduct --field=ID | head -1);wp menu item add-post "Footer Secondary" $idd --title="CODE OF CONDUCT" --position=2
scripts.core:initial-content-30: wp option update copyright "Unless otherwise stated, the content on this website is licensed under a CC0 International License"
